com.noctarius.tengi.server

Interface Server


  • public interface Server

    The Server interface is the static entry point for tengi servers. It provides a factory method to create new server instances based on given Configurations.

       Configuration configuration = buildConfiguration();
   Server server = Server.create(configuration);
   CompletableFuture<Channel> future = server.start(
       (connection) -> connection.addMessageListener(...));

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Server create(Configuration configuration)
      This factory method is used to create new Server instances.
      CompletableFuture<Server> start(ConnectedListener connectedListener)
      Starts the created Server instance and binds the given ConnectedListener to notify the user application whenever a new client has connected and successfully finished the initial handshake.
      CompletableFuture<Server> stop()
      Stops the current server instance and unbinds the transport ports.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        CompletableFuture<Server> start(ConnectedListener connectedListener)

        Starts the created Server instance and binds the given ConnectedListener to notify the user application whenever a new client has connected and successfully finished the initial handshake.

        Parameters:
        connectedListener - the ConnectedListener to handle new client connections
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture representing the pending startup
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when connectedListener is null
        IllegalStateException - whenever the server instance is in a non-startable state

      • stop

        CompletableFuture<Server> stop()
        Stops the current server instance and unbinds the transport ports. In addition it closes all currently open client connections and releases internally used resources.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture representing the pending stop process

      • create

        static Server create(Configuration configuration)
              throws Exception
        This factory method is used to create new Server instances. It will use the given configuration to setup internals and to register necessary transports.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to setup the client
        Returns:
        the created server instance bound to the given configuration
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when configuration is null
        CertificateException - when the server is started with SSL but the SSL context cannot be created
        Exception - whenever an unexpected situation occurs
